rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a small foyer area leading to the main living spaces. Vastu compliant design ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows facing the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation. The orientation is kept in mind to maintain harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen placed towards the North-East for Vastu compliance and ease of access from dining area. Ventilation openings are designed to reduce heat.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for convenience; includes a small seating area. Windows face the courtyard for light.

rooms.name: Bedroom (Master)
rooms.description: Master bedroom with an attached spacious balcony on the east side to ensure morning light and adherence to Vastu. The placement ensures privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing the north to align with Vastu norms. Provides a welcoming and secure entry.
Large window in the living room providing natural light and ventilation from the central courtyard.
Ventilation opening in the kitchen to ensure proper airflow and compliance with building norms.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom/Study
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room that can serve as a guest bedroom or study area. Includes a balcony with south-facing orientation to balance Vastu energy.

openings.description: Access door for the upper floor, designed to provide secure entry and exit.
Window in guest bedroom providing natural light and an external view to the central courtyard.
